com.datastax.oss.driver.api.core.metadata.schema

Interface Describable

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    AggregateMetadata, DseAggregateMetadata, DseFunctionMetadata, DseGraphKeyspaceMetadata, DseGraphTableMetadata, DseIndexMetadata, DseKeyspaceMetadata, DseRelationMetadata, DseTableMetadata, DseViewMetadata, FunctionMetadata, IndexMetadata, KeyspaceMetadata, RelationMetadata, TableMetadata, UserDefinedType, ViewMetadata

    public interface Describable
    A schema element that can be described in terms of CQL CREATE statements.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String describe(boolean pretty)
      Returns a single CQL statement that creates the element.
      String describeWithChildren(boolean pretty)
      Returns a CQL script that creates the element and all of its children.

    • Method Detail

      • describe

        @NonNull
String describe(boolean pretty)
        Returns a single CQL statement that creates the element.
        Parameters:
        pretty - if true, make the output more human-readable (line breaks, indents, and pretty identifiers). If false, return the statement on a single line with minimal formatting.

      • describeWithChildren

        @NonNull
String describeWithChildren(boolean pretty)
        Returns a CQL script that creates the element and all of its children. For example: a schema with its tables, materialized views, types, etc. A table with its indices.
        Parameters:
        pretty - if true, make the output more human-readable (line breaks, indents, and pretty identifiers). If false, return each statement on a single line with minimal formatting.
